body.name: Mothca Matte Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 14 Pro Anti-Glare & Anti-Fingerprint Tempered Glass Clear Film Case Friendly Easy Install Bubble Free for iPhone 14 Pro 6.1-inch (2022)-Smooth as Silk
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 32 mins
features: 【HD Clear】Screen Protector Compatible with iPhone 14 Pro - 2022 6.1 inch smartphone. Tempered Glass with 9H screen hardness, Mothca matte screen protector is matte finish but also HD clear. While some poor quality matte glass has poor clarity and transparency, we promise you never need to worry about the same problem for Mothca Matte Glass.

【Smooth as Silk】The perfect matte surface has the silk-like touch feeling, magically resists dirt, sweat and annoying fingerprints, very little frictional resistance even for hand sweating. Easy to flick operation, "Comfortable Game Operation". 100% touch accurate.
【Anti-Glare】The matte finish tempered glass using the same technology as E-reader matte screen, no screen glare, even in bright sunlight, no dazzling, easy reading outdoor or under light.

【Go Further Than 2.5D Round Edge】A special polishing is crafted to edge of the glass to give a more smooth touch feeling, go further than 2.5D round edge, not easy to be broken and extremely durable. 9H hardness, protect your iPhone 14 Pro screen from scratches, daily wear and drops.

【Easy to Install】Mothca screen protector comes with precise installation alignment frame that make installation quick and easy, even for beginners. Please watch the video tutorial before installing if you don’t know how to get started.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mothca Matte Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 14 Pro 6.1-inch CASE FRIENDLY: Mothca iPhone 14 Pro Matte screen protector will allow you to use almost all kinds of case. DAILY PROTECTION: Designed with a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating and an anti-scratch surface to protect your screen from accidental spills, oil residue from fingerprints, bumps and daily wear-and-tear. Package included: 1 x Matte Tempered Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 14 Pro 6.1-inch1 x Cleaning Set1 x Alignment Sticker1 x Installation Instructions1 x Retail Packaging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have always purchased Mothca brand screen protectors so I'm not concerned about durability. They do their job! My other Mocha screen protector protected my iPhone screen on Sunday after I accidentally dropped my phone from a ladder. This one came fast too. Ordered Sunday, received today (Tuesday). I wanted the matte before, but it was unavailable last year when I purchased my phone. The process of installing this screen protector is super easy. I had it off-center a little bit and was able to reposition it and I did not end up with any bubbles under the glass. I like how there is a clear oval over the front camera to allow clear photos. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to install, it doesn’t show fingerprints and has no glare. I’m pretty rough on my phone screen, I carry them in my pocket and drop the phone all the time. I have never noticed any scratching, and the only time it has cracked was when I drop the phone screen down onto gravel. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and warranty
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with matte screen protector. feels very nice on my iPhone and iPad. The anti glare is very nice on glossy screen devices and has a nice texture to it that dosent affect clarity and makes the devices more satisfying to use. I am even more satisfied with the customer service provided. they stand by their warranty and replaced my screen protectors when I let them know that I had two that cracked. This will be my primary choice when choosing screen protectors in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the matte look / anti glare
reviews.reviewText: Hi! Love this product - however, it cracked the 2nd day I had it. :( super bummed because the crack is so distracting. Otherwise I love the matte look, super smooth and no glare!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer support
reviews.reviewText: The customer support is really good and fast I had a mix up where I received the wrong size and they sent me the right one within 2 days no charge the screen protector is also really good the matte helps with sunlight reflection and glossy and not having to be looking politizar like the privacy ones. 5 stars all day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No fingerprints??? Sign me up!!!
reviews.reviewText: Couldn’t be happier with this screen protector. Never cared for them but I’m always dealing with sweaty hands and my phone screen always gets fingerprints. This helps so much and it removes a glare too. They make it sooooo easy to put this on too. This will be my go to brand now for screen protectors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful antiglare and surface texture
reviews.reviewText: Antiglare works! Phone was easily visible on a dashboard mount even in direct sunlight.Installation video is clear but it’s is not as easy as it looks. I managed to align it perfectly but ended up with a few dust particles. A steamy bathroom after a hot shower is a great place to install all screen protectors because there’s less dust in the air, but alas, I was in a rush and didn’t do that.Bad news though, after about 3 weeks, I noticed a chip along the bottom edge. I cannot remember dropping the phone on anything hard - just once onto the carpeted footwell of my car. Cracks were growing. I easily removed it, just carefully lifted by an edge. I purchased another that I haven’t installed yet. There was no damage to the iPhone screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst filter I bought in the last 10 years
reviews.reviewText: I spent over 1h trying to install the filter, I followed all the instruction to clean and remove all dust, yet the filter was always gathering bumps under it.The sticky tape trick doesn't work as there is no way to lift the filter like that. the filter kept coming off as I was trying to remove whatever was trapped under there and after so many times trying to reapply it, it was getting worse and worse and eventually the filter broke.The alignment tool also doesn't really work, it was being aligned to low or too high or too much on the left or the right...IMHO it's a great concept that was poorly implemented...I removed my old filter to put this one which did not work for 1h and put back the old filter that looked perfect within 1 minute!!!Money completely wasted on this product...
I like the matte finish and the way it prevents fingerprints is awesome. Not as great if a person watches long movies on their phone.
La pellicola opaca è facile da applicare e resistente, forse un po’ cara considerando che nn credo sia proprio vetro temperato. Però protegge

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 5, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Dit is een van de beste screen protectors die ik al gehad heb. Het is ook fantastisch dat het mat is, het heeft echt veel voordelen. Je ziet vele minder vinger afdrukken, als er tegenwicht is langs achter je kan je nog steeds lezen wat er op je scherm staat, je hebt geen reflecties op je scherm waardoor je altijd helder alles ziet, … ik ben er zeer tevreden over!

Super écran Matte , permet de fortement limiter les traces de doigts et les reflets du soleil.Seul point négatif , on a un aspect « grain » qui entraine une petite baisse de qualité de l’affichage je trouve .
